metadata.Title: CVE-2013-20001 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenZFS through 2.0.3. When an NFS share is exported to IPv6 addresses via the sharenfs feature, there is a silent failure to parse the IPv6 address data, and access is allowed to everyone. IPv6 restrictions from the configuration are not applied.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2021-03-23, there doesn't appear to be an upstream fix available

criterions.comment: zfs-linux package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
